alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 8:25PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sweetwater County through 900 PM MDT... At 823 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms in rural portions of southeast Sweetwater County moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Sweetwater County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
